homePage.whoAreWeDescription: Donate PC is a non-profit non-governmental organization whose goal is for every family in Macedonia to have at least one computer, because a computer is a necessary tool for learning, not a luxury. For 6 years, donations of used computers have been carried out throughout the territory of Macedonia and more than 1500 families have been provided with a computer.
homePage.whatWeDoDescription: A large percentage of children do not have access to computers and cannot follow online teaching. Our mission is to lend a hand to those children and provide them with an education during the pandemic. Together with your help we will create a better tomorrow!

navbar.accordionFirstAnswer: This is the first item's accordion body. It is shown by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. These classes control the overall appearance, as well as the showing and hiding via CSS transitions. You can modify any of this with custom CSS or overriding our default variables. It's also worth noting that just about any HTML can go within the .accordion-body, though the transition does limit overflow.
navbar.accordionSecondAnswer: This is the second item's accordion body. It is hidden by default, until the collapse plugin adds the appropriate classes that we use to style each element. These classes control the overall appearance, as well as the showing and hiding via CSS transitions. You can modify any of this with custom CSS or overriding our default variables. It's also worth noting that just about any HTML can go within the .accordion-body, though the transition does limit overflow.

aboutPage.aboutPageHeroTitleDescriptionPart: Донирај компјутер е непрофитерска невладина организација чија цел е секое семејство во Македонија да има по барем еден компјутер бидејки компјутерот е потребна алатка за учење, а не луксуз. Веќе 6 години се вршат донации на половни компјутери низ територијата на цела Македонија и на над 1500 семејства им е обезбеден компјутер.

volunteer.details: Details about you volunteering, experience, motivation
volunteer.dataApproval: By filling in and sending this form, I agree that Doniraj Computer can collect, process and store my personal data for the needs of the volunteer recruitment process for the entire duration of the process, and after the end of the process, the data can be stored in the database of data of the Association for recruitment volunteer needs in accordance with laws and regulations.
volunteer.partOfUs: You can be part of us
volunteer.reasonOne: Have you ever thought about how you can help others feel good and at the same time be happy with your actions?
volunteer.basicHelp: Help by donating your time and ideas
volunteer.reasonTwo: Our volunteers are simultaneously learning, socializing and will soon make someone happy with their work.
volunteer.areYouTheGuy: If you are kind, smiling, full of energy, you want to help and you want to be part of our team then...
volunteer.volunteerReasonsFirstPart: The reasons for volunteering are different, but most of the time it is the desire to help others. People often volunteer to show commitment to a certain cause, to contribute to a certain goal that they feel is a civic duty, to help people and organizations that need help, to fill their free time, etc.

cta.ctaHeroFirstPart: Doniraj PC is a civil association that works on digital inclusion and equality in the quality of education for every child in Macedonia. Take the computers you don't need to the nearest Neptun store. Once a week they collect them in their store in Kavadarci. We collect, repair and donate computers to children in socially disadvantaged families who cannot afford them. In these 6 years, we donated 1819, but the fact remains that 38181 families are still without a computer in Macedonia and are waiting for us (the data is that there were 40,000 in September 2020.)
cta.ctaHeroSecondPart: To get a computer you need to follow the following steps: 1. Apply on our page on the button above Apply for a computer. 2. Expect a response for an approved application via email or SMS. 3. Once the application is approved, we prepare a computer for you! 4. We pack the computer and send it to your address. 5. The computer travels to be delivered. 6. You have a computer in your home!
cta.ctaOtherWay: Looking for other way to help?
cta.ctaOtherWayDescription: Ndihma si mënyrë e të menduarit dhe e të vepruarit është mënyra më e bukur e jetës.

blog.melemDescription: Sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 from 'de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum' by Cicero are also reproduced in their exact original form, accompanied by English versions from the 1914 translation by H. Rackham.

contribute.contributeHeroHeader: Choose one of the many ways to help
contribute.contributeTravelTitle: Do you travel often and would you like to transport a PC?
contribute.contributeTravelParagraphOne: If you are traveling and want to help us blow up computers for those who need them, contact us and we will be very happy to have you participate in our mission.
contribute.contributeStoryParagraph: Do you enjoy telling meaningful stories? Explain the concept of Donate a Computer and share your experience with your family and friends, tag us on social networks and help grow our success.
contribute.contributeLanguageTitle: Can you translate into multiple languages?
contribute.contributeLanguageParagraph: If you are a translator or know a language well, you can help us translate into as many languages ​​as possible so that the whole world can get to know us.
contribute.contributeRecycleParagraph: Thanks to Zero Waste you can get rid of the devices you don't use so that they will be recycled and reused.
contribute.contributeShareSkillsTitle: You have a desire to share your computer skills?
contribute.contributeShareSkillsParagraph: With your skills you can help and educate those who need it. Join our new action.
contribute.contributeShareSkillsParagraphTwo: Learn more in the Education section of our site.
contribute.contributeLastParagraphOne: If you find yourself in one or more offered options,
contribute.contributeLastParagraphTwo: then don't hesitate and become part of our success story!
